dt-option.name: searchBuilder.preDefined.type
dt-option.summary: Set the type for an object on the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria`

type.description: The value for the type of an object on the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria` array.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.type` option is `undefined`. A type must be set to indicate whether the object is a group or a criteria.
dt-option.description:
This is useful as it allows type to be defined objects on the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria` array.
This must have a value of either `criteria` or `group` to indicate whether the object is a criteria or group respectively.

example.title: Simple single level search showing both types
